title: Why was maths and science difficult after 10th standard? - Quora

response.answer_text: Things are never tough or easy its you mindset that makes the things hard and easy. Maths and science aren’t tough after 10 but students start taking it tough due to which they develop phobia for the students ,do not understand it well and do not perform well in the subject. If things are done which complete devotion and hardwork sucess is sure.

No it's not difficult maths and science are of only some what higher level If some one is perfect with the concepts of math from childhood he will not find anything difficult in maths and science ….. Thnx………………………
